allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove staticfiles from git and update .gitignore

- Remove 205+ generated staticfiles from git tracking \(staticfiles/ is Django''s STATIC_ROOT, generated by collectstatic\)
- Update .gitignore to properly ignore Django build artifacts:
  - staticfiles/ \(collectstatic output\)
  - media/ \(user uploads\)
  - __pycache__/ and *.pyc \(Python cache\)
  - db.sqlite3, .env, venv/ \(common dev files\)
- Clean up Python cache directories
- Source static files remain in whatupsf/static/ \(properly tracked\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
